attributes.action: Re-Nationalise ALL Public transport to run on social need and not for commercial profit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public transport system is in chaos as it lacks any coherence. A fully integrated policy for buses, trains, domestic flights and taxis must be established. This is extremely urgent if we are to get people to use the public transport system. It must be available when needed and efficient.
